welcome_message_body: Welcome to Socorro, the charming city known for its rich history and natural beauty. We hope you will enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our lovely city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Abraham Gonzalez International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Abraham Gonzalez International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Paso International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Sun Country Terminal
terminals.description: The Sun Country Terminal is used exclusively by Sun Country Airlines for their flights to and from El Paso.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggs AAF Airport serves all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Biggs AAF Airport provides services for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
